title: DDFP 491: Week 3 Red Challenge Flag Picks "Menu" & Dad Jokes
itunes:title: DDFP 491: Week 3 Red Challenge Flag Picks "Menu" & Dad Jokes
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank, Matt "Money" Smith and Matt Harmon to discuss their power rankings as of Week 3, the games they are looking forward to the most this weekend and deliver their highly anticipated "Dad Jokes." Then, producer EmmaVP transforms Studio 66 into French restaurant "Chez Shek" and the guys review an entire menu describing the biggest Week 3 matchups. The guys debate and make their picks for the "Entrée" games in this special edition of "Red Challenge Flag Picks."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
